title: Glacier National Park: Guided Tours
body: Guided Tours                 Boat Tours   Boat tours with commentary are available at Many Glacier, Two Medicine, Rising Sun, and Lake McDonald.           Bus Tours   Sun Tours offers interpretive tours highlighting Blackfeet culture. Xanterra  offers tours on Glacier's fleet of historic red buses.          Guided Hikes   Guided day hikes, backpacking trips, and drop-camp service are available in Glacier's backcountry.          Raft Tours   Several raft companies operate commercially guided raft trips on the Middle Fork and North Fork of the Flathead River.          Horseback Rides   Guided horseback rides are available inside the park at Many Glacier, Lake McDonald, and Apgar.
